/v1/api/firearms.desc: Limit results to those matching a string.
Current page of the collection. Default is 0
Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Default is 10
Limit results to those with matching classification
Order sort attribute ascending or descending. Options: asc and desc.

/v1/api/classification.desc: Limit results to those matching a string.
Current page of the collection. Default is 0
Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Default is 10
Order sort attribute ascending or descending. Options: asc and desc.
